meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dan Feitel Lenny Porges Choyon Manjrekar Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7077.

td.p: Dan Feitel, an attorney originally from Gillette, New Jersey
Lenny Porges, a retailer from Tucson, Arizona
Choyon Manjrekar, an urban planner from Providence, Rhode Island (whose 3-day cash winnings total $56,700)

tr.td: THE OCCULT
JACK IN THE BOXING RING
EPONYMS
ASIAN HISTORY
FAMILIAR NUMBERS
A STATE OF VWLLSSNSS
(Alex: We are going to give you states without the vowels. See how well you can identify them.)

LennyWhat is an elm?
$7,000
DanWhat is an olive tree
$13,799
an olive tree')
